alert.note: Alert for Screven (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 11:16AM EDT until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Savannah River at Burtons Ferry. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, flooding of some adjacent agricultural lands occurs. Most boat ramps along the river are unusable. At 18.2 feet, the picnic area at Stoney Bluff Landing becomes flooded. Access to the house at the end of Stoney Bluff Landing Road is limited. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 945 AM EDT Wednesday, the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening and continue rising to a crest of 18.9 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
